sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Dear [Recipient Name/Team],

This email confirms the receipt of your notification/report regarding the list of unmatched trades as of [Date] / [Time]. Thank you for sending this information promptly.

We understand the urgency of resolving these discrepancies to ensure timely settlement. Our Middle Office/Trade Support team has immediately initiated the review and reconciliation process for all items listed.

We will focus on identifying the root cause of the unmatched status for each trade and coordinating with the relevant counterparty or department to achieve a match.

You can expect an initial status update on the resolution progress by [Time/Date for next update].

In the meantime, if there are any specific trades on this list that require critical, immediate attention or involve a regulatory deadline, please reply to this email or contact us directly at [Phone Number].

Thank you for your cooperation as we work to clear these items.

Sincerely,

[Your Name] [Your Title/Team Name] [Your Contact Information]
sysevent_email_template.name: Acknowledgement of Receipt
sysevent_email_template.subject: Acknowledgement of Receipt ${number}
